explanation: [0-0] In a room with white walls, a man wearing a pink short-sleeved shirt stands facing forward. In front of him, on a white mat, lies a pink balloon. He holds a knife with a red handle in one hand and another with a yellow handle in the other. He has a pained expression on his face, frowning. To the right, there is a beige wall with bay windows. The text "TikTok@junya1gou" is displayed on the screen.
[0-5] Next, the man closes his eyes in pain, his mouth wide open. He then speaks while looking down and then forward. He keeps holding the knives in his hands.
